title: Vinylene-linked diketopyrrolopyrrole chromophores for electrochromism
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10017-10023
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01280A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Vinutha K. V., Rajeswara Rao M.
Novel series of vinylene-linked DPP compounds were synthesized via Knoevenagel condensation of dimethyl DPP (6) with various aromatic aldehydes. The compounds are redox active and exhibit reversible electrochromism with NIR-to-NIR switching.
